About Me

Hey! I'm Michael, MDL for short.

My passion for analytics has mostly stemmed from reading 538 articles during my time in university. I've always admired the way they do a majority of their storytelling through responsive visualizations instead of treating them as afterthoughts between boring walls of text. While Iâ€™m nowhere near their level of technical artistry, I hope to be one day soon.

In the meantime, I intend to use this space to post any fun side projects I'm working on. Serious projects have a time and place, but this is not one of them. While my definition of fun is subjective, it will most likely be a collection of strange datasets I've scraped or a portfolio of dashboards that I think are interesting.
